name: Tic Tac Toe Free `
description:
***Awesome Tic Tac Toe Game!!!!***

Tic Tac Toe Free is free classic puzzle game also known as "noughts and crosses or sometimes X and O".

Tic Tac Toe Free supports one player and two player gameplay, so you can play against another human or against your iOS device.

Our Tic Tac Toe Free game offers:
- 3 different game levels (game difficulties)
- One player (play against your iOS device)
- Two players (play against another human)
- Player name configuration

The Tic Tac Toe game is a game for two players, called "X" and "O", who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The player who succeeded in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game.
The Tic Tac Toe is a great way to pass your free time whether you're standing in a line or spending time with your kids. Stop wasting paper and save trees.

The game has the below alternative English names.

* Tick-tack-toe, tic-tac-toe, tick-tat-toe, or tit-tat-toe
* Noughts and crosses or Naughts and crosses
* Exy-Ozys, Xsie-Osies
* Xs and Os
* X and O
* O-X
developers: Awesome Cool and Free Fun Games
publishers: Awesome Cool and Fun Free Games
